titleStmt.title: The perusal of an old statute concerning death and judgment as it was lately delivered in a sermon at the funeral of Mrs. Frances Bedford. By James Bedford B.D. Sometime Fellow of Q. Coll. in Oxon. and now pastor of Blunsham and Erith in Huningtonshire.
titleStmt.author: Bedford, James, B.D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Daggers neer the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Bound with Thomason Tract items dated 1658.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 30"; the 7 in the date has been changed to an 8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Daggers neer the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleet-street
